verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesosy 么, hariva ny andro ;
Mitoera aminay.
Efa hidify izao ny masoandro,
Matahotra izahay.
Hiari-tory foana izahay
Raha tsy Ianao
No miambina anay.
Jesosy 么, meteza hitoetra
Ety an-dasinay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesosy 么, Ianao no mazava,
Hiposaka aminay.
Ny tahotray hisinda, ho rava,
Ho sambatra izahay.
Ny tsy finoana, esory aminay.
O ! misehoa mba ho tokinay.
Jesosy 么, Ianao no antenaina,
Ianao no aronay.
